text: (ai eemaanadaaron) agar tumako bhalaee chhoo bhee gayee to unako bura maaloom hota hai aur jab tumapar koee bhee museebat padatee hai to vah khush ho jaate hain aur agar tum sabr karo aur parahezagaaree ikhteyaar karo to unaka fareb tumhen kuchh bhee zarar nahin pahunchaega (kyonki) khuda to unakee kaarastaaniyon par haavee hai
